name: Nekomancer (Wes Does, Midoski)
description:
Nekomancer is an occult arcade-inspired platformer. Take control of a witch's familiar to collect ingredients for a spooky spell!

This game's tutorial assumes an Xbox controller, but WASD works as well.

NOTE: This game is a jam game and the special effects are poorly optimized, resulting in bad performance on many integrated graphics cards.

Mouse & Keyboard Controls

  • Move with  WASD.
  • Jump with space.
  • Cat-bap with left click.

Team

  • Max Piepenbrink
  • Lucy Stevens
  • Charlie Anderson
  • Wesley Mueller
